title: Problems with Mastery Levels... Help?
body: So i have had a few S ranks with Volibear and i havent been getting any fragments to get him to level him to mastery level 7. is there a specific game mode u have to play? i know ARAM used to do it and now it doesnt. so please help. ;/

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you'll only earn Mastery Tokens on Summoner's Rift Normals or Ranked. Additionally, to earn level 7 mastery tokens, you'll have to earn an S or S+ rank. S- ranks will not grant you a level 7 mastery token.

For a complete rundown on the Champion Mastery system, take a peep at our [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
You only earn [mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q7)tokens when playing on normal or ranked Summoner's rift.  ARAM doesn't count.
